name: typedoc-plugin-regex-filter
description: A TypeDoc plugin that filters references by RegExp

scripts.test:manual: npm run build && typedoc --readme none --entryPointStrategy expand test/ && serve docs
scripts.test:manual-no-plugin: npm run build && typedoc --readme none --entryPointStrategy expand --plugin none test/ && serve docs

author: David Klingenberg (https://github.com/klinki)
